descriptionHTML:
This Android Wear watchface is a interactive face with analogic time and the most relevant information, chooose between differents military designs and looks different every day, smart and customizable app launcher

Note: You can try before buy, download our free version in:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=es.samsoft.wear.digitalcamouflagewatchface

Discover what makes


► Exclusive design for square and rounds screens.

► This watchface alerts you when you let your phone far of you, in this way you don't forget it.

► Interactive watch face, access to the smart and customizable app laucher for open more easy any app and open the android wear settings from his shortcut. For Android Wear 2 you can open the menu app settings (force stop, uninstall,...) with a long click in any app.

► Looks your wear different every day, combine colors or the background type, hands watch type and watch frame, make your favorite style.

► Step counter, track your daily steps and set your goal for make healthy lifestyle, you can review the statistics by week, month or year.

► You can see at a galance the battery of your phone without take it, and look the smartwatch battery too.

► Also shows you full date and time.

Visit our blog to know more of free Android Wear watch faces and review the full article of this watch face [Spanish]:

http://samsoft.es/Blog/watch-face-camuflaje-android-wear/

Features:

★ Smart and customizable wear app launcher, to open, push on center of the watchface
★ Android wear settings shortcut pushing on gear button from watch face
★ Step counter with configurable steps goal and statistics
★ Screen timeout control
★ Disconnection alert when your mobile is far of you
★ Exclusive design for squares and rounds screens
★ Customize the background, details, hands watch style and watch frame type.
★ Relevant information at a galance like devices batteries (phone and watch), date, time, daily steps.
★ Low battery drain


Other free Android Wear watchfaces on:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=7925815075249357158


Compatibility

ALL devices with Android Wear, like:

-Huawei watch
-Moto 360
-Polar M600
-Sony SmartWatch
-Asus ZenWatch
-....

NOT with:

-Other OS different of Android Wear

FAQ:

1.-Check that the phone is connected to the smartwatch.
2.-Install the Watch Face.
3.-Wait two minutes until a notification appears with the installation on your smartwatch
4.-If it not appears then you must open Android Wear and run resync apps
5.-If the notification appears, you must press on it or long press on the screen for you take the watch faces list for select it.
6.-Enjoy it!!!

*Note: For Android Wear 2 watches you need download the wear app from playstore in your watch.

For any suggestion or problem contact us on:

http://samsoft.es/Blog/contacto

Or:

https://plus.google.com/+SamsoftEsIT

Or

contacto@samsoft.es

See you soon, regards.
recentChanges: - App menu with long press in any app in the app launcher (only in wear
